channel.title: Fat Pipes on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Fat Pipes on 0x000216

item.title: Are Your Pipes Fat Enough?
item.description: Higher resolution data demands more bandwidth, and WAN connections can become bottlenecks. Imagine a kink in a garden hose - the data is the water, and bandwidth is the pressure. Just as a kink restricts water flow, limited bandwidth slows data transfer, even with efficient network engineering. A larger pipe is needed for faster flow, just as a fatter data pipe is necessary for faster data transfer. The increasing size and resolution of electronic business data necessitate these “fatter pipes.
